Planned releases#

  • 0.3 first version on github

  • 0.4 gset, axes - setting plot limits and plotting axes

  • 0.5 latitude-height plots

  • 0.6 gopen, gclose, gpos opening and closing of output files/plot positioning

  • 0.7 cscale - colour scales

  • 0.8 stipple - significance plots

  • 0.9 vect - vector plotting

  • 1.0 data interface improvements

  • 1.1 error handling

  • 1.2 Hovmoller plots

  • 1.3 Bug/feature fix version 1.3 changes

  • 1.4 PDF user guide

  • 1.5 Bug/feature fix version 1.5 changes

  • 1.6 Rotated pole plots version 1.6 changes

  • 1.7 Rolling update of features version 1.7 changes

  • 1.8 Graph plots version 1.8 changes

  • 1.9 Rolling update of features version 1.9 changes

  • 2.0 Code base changes version 2.0 changes

  • 2.1 Rolling set of small additions and bug fixes version 2.1 changes

  • 2.2 Change from Basemap to Cartopy mapping version 2.2 changes

  • 2.3 Support for the UKCP grid version 2.3 changes

  • 2.4 Trajectories version 2.4 changes

  • 3.0 Port to Python 3 and Mac OSX version 3.0 changes

  • 3.1 UGRID support version 3.1 changes

  • 3.2 Rolling bugfix version version 3.2 changes

  • 3.3 UGRID support updated version 3.3 changes

Further functionality may be added on request - please email <sadie.bartholomew@ncas.ac.uk> with details.
